trans-unit.source: Creates a line between two points in a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en linje mellom to punkt i en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to create composite shapes using LineSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>objektet for å opprette sammensatte figurer ved hjelp av LineSegment objekter og andre segmenter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The LineSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the line.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LineSegment inneholder ikke en egenskap for startpunktet for linjen.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the line is the end point of the previous segment, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> if no other segments exist.
trans-unit.target: Startpunktet for linjen er endepunktet for det forrige segmentet eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>Hvis det finnes ingen segmenter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because LineSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Freezable funksjoner:** fordi LineSegment objekter arve fra den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>klassen de har flere spesielle funksjoner: de kan er deklarert som delt mellom flere objekter, skrivebeskyttet å forbedre ytelsen, klone og gjort sikker.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om de ulike funksjonene som tilbys av <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter, se [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"></xref> class that has the specified end <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> and Boolean that determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"></xref> is stroked.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"> </xref> klasse som ikke har den angitte sluttdatoen <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> og boolsk verdi som bestemmer om dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"> </xref> er streket.

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sluttpunktet for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to stroke this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å tegne langs denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"> </xref> ved å gjøre dype kopier av verdiene.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å kunne endres kopiere skrivebeskyttet <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger selv om de ikke kan løses.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Den kopierer ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres dype kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *>-egenskapen for det klonede objektet returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om den <> </> *> egenskapen for datakilden<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.LineSegment"> </xref> -objektet ved å lage dype kopier av verdiene.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, or animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kopierer ikke refererer til ressursen, databindinger eller animasjoner, selv om det kopiere gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å kunne endres kopiere skrivebeskyttet <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres dype kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om den <> </> *> egenskapen for datakilden er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end point of the line segment.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir endepunktet på linjen segmentet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> class does not contain a property for the starting point of the line.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>klassen inneholder ikke en egenskap for startpunktet for linjen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the line is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object where you add the line.
trans-unit.target: Startpunktet for linjen er gjeldende punktet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>objektet der du legge til linjen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The end point of the line segment.
trans-unit.target: Endepunktet på linjen segmentet.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment.Point*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment.Point*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment.Point*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
